TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DnnImageFeaturizerEstimator extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.ML.Core.Data.IEstimator`1<class Microsoft.ML.Data.TransformerChain`1<class Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ColumnCopyingTransformer>>
Public NotInheritable Class DnnImageFeaturizerEstimator Implements IEstimator(Of TransformerChain(Of ColumnCopyingTransformer))

Docs.summary: The Dnn Image Featurizer is just a wrapper around two s and three with present pretrained DNN models. The ColumnsCopying are there to allow arbitrary column input and output names, as by default the ONNXTransform requires the names of the columns to be identical to the names of the ONNX model nodes. Note that because of this, it only works on Windows machines as that is a constraint of the OnnxTransform.

MemberSignature.Value: public DnnImageFeaturizerEstimator (Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment env, Func<Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnImageFeaturizerInput,Microsoft.ML.Data.EstimatorChain<Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ColumnCopyingTransformer>> modelFactory, string inputColumn, string outputColumn);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment env, class System.Func`2<class Microsoft.ML.Transforms.DnnImageFeaturizerInput, class Microsoft.ML.Data.EstimatorChain`1<class Microsoft.ML.Transforms.ColumnCopyingTransformer>> modelFactory, string inputColumn, string outputColumn) cil managed
Public Sub New (env As IHostEnvironment, modelFactory As Func(Of DnnImageFeaturizerInput, EstimatorChain(Of ColumnCopyingTransformer)), inputColumn As String, outputColumn As String)

Docs.param: An extension method on the that creates a chain of two s (one for preprocessing and one with a pretrained image DNN) with specific models included in a package together with that extension method. It also contains three s to allow arbitrary column naming, as the ONNXEstimators require very specific naming based on the models. For an example, see Microsoft.ML.DnnImageFeaturizer.ResNet18
Docs.summary: Constructor for the estimator for a DnnImageFeaturizer transform.

Docs.summary: Note that OnnxEstimator which this is based on is a trivial estimator, so this does not do any actual training, just verifies the schema.
